name: Barbell Good Morning
description: Position barbell across upper back in squat position. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, soft bend in knees. Brace your core hard. Push hips back while keeping back flat and chest up, lowering torso until nearly parallel to floor. Feel the deep stretch in hamstrings. Squeeze glutes and drive hips forward to return.
